name: Expedition: Artifact
description:
"Our game, Expedition: Artifact, demonstrates what certain aspects of archeology would look like in a gamified form, while also bringing about a fun and informative experience of various cultures. Currently we focus on Jordan as our setting, but should we continue this project, we would love to delve deeper, but also expand our game to include many other cultures. We recognize that the ability to see and visit many world class museums is a privilege not everyone has, so we hope that we can spread information and knowledge in a fun and accessible way to those who may be interested."

*Tutorial Typo: Tutorial text says "Right-Click" to attack, but "Left-Click" actually attacks*

Made for the 2021 CULTURAL HERITAGE GAME JAM by Milo Fisher, Emily Wen, and Sam Fisher
